sentences.en: ...a reformed alcoholic extolling the joys of temperance.
sentences.cn: ...一个已戒掉酒瘾的人对戒酒的好处赞不绝口。

sentences.en: " I never expected to find a temperance advocate in my own home, of all places! "
sentences.cn: " 我还从没想到竟然我自己家里会有个提倡戒酒的人呢!

sentences.en: After supper he talked to him about temperance and such things till the old man cried.
sentences.cn: 吃完了晚饭,他给他讲了一套关于戒酒的大道理,讲得老头子直抹眼泪.

sentences.en: At bottom both were troubled and ashamed, for he was a high - up son of Temperance.
sentences.cn: 他们俩内心都感到不安和惭愧, 因为他是个有名的戒酒会会员.

sentences.en: Exercise, temperance , fresh a _ r. and needful rest are the best all physicians.
sentences.cn: 锻炼 、 节制 、 新鲜空气和必要的休息是最好的医生.

sentences.en: He that can have temperance can have what he will.
sentences.cn: 只有能够自制的人才能实现他的志向.

sentences.en: In the temperance question, Mr White takes his stand on total abstinence.
sentences.cn: 在戒酒难题上, 怀特先生是主张完全戒掉.

sentences.en: Maybe ALL the Temperance Taverns have got a ha'nted room, hey, Huck? "
sentences.cn: 也许所有的禁酒客栈都有个闹鬼的房间, 喂, 哈克,你说是不是? ”

sentences.en: Temperance should be applied not only to food and drink, but to work and play.
sentences.cn: 不仅在食物饮酒方面, 而且在工作与游戏上,也要有节制.

sentences.en: Temperance: Eat not to dullness; drink not to elevation.
sentences.cn: 节制: 食不可过饱, 饮不得过量.

sentences.en: TEMPERANCE. Eat not to dullness ; drink not to elevation.
sentences.cn: 自制. 自我克制,不放纵自己.

sentences.en: The old man preached temperance to young people.
sentences.cn: 那位老人劝年轻人戒酒.

sentences.en: The patient had to practice temperance in eating and drinking.
sentences.cn: 这个病人不得不节制饮食.

sentences.en: The temperance [ dry ; anti - alcohol ] movement revived in the city.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的 禁酒 运动又活跃起来了.

sentences.en: The temperance league wanted to close all the saloons in town.
sentences.cn: 禁酒联合会要关闭镇上所有的酒吧.
